## Options interface

Allowed options for a request. Extends native `RequestInit`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface Options<ResponseAs extends ResponseAsTypes = ResponseAsTypes> extends RequestInit 
```
**Extends:** RequestInit
